title: support XML transformation with XSLT from file:// url
body: With IE6/7/8/9/10/11 it is possible to transform XML with XSLT by double-clicking on the XML file, i.e. from file:// url.

comments.body: This is a primary consideration for us.  We use XML files for lots of various details specification and provide XSL to format them for human consumption.  Having to have a web server serve them up makes it difficult to consult these details while in remote locations service equipment and other places where these details are used.
